Name: Set Café
About the game: Welcome to Set Cafe! A game where you can practice and play different variations of an addictive card game. Although easy to understand, set is a game rich in mathematical structure, making it a game loved by educators for its representation of combinatorics, resulting in improving and maintaining memory and pattern recognition. Features include: * Set Classic * Set Static * Set Slam! * Highscores and achievements * High contrast color option * Minimal background toggle * Cute music and sounds * Cats
